verbs.description: [ARG1: smithtown man] [V: charged] [ARG2: with cutting cell tower cables at a gated community of townhouses in smithtown] a cell tower has sprouted just a stone throw away and a resident of one of the townhouses closest to the tower has been arrested for cutting the tower cables 210-foot tower john slattery 210 foot tower long island cell cbs smithtown ronald derisi vandalism smithtown new york janet berry n y
